title: Fix frontend build-breaking placeholder modules and add build troubleshooting notes

requirements.summary: Ensure all placeholder TSX modules compile by exporting valid React components (or ensuring they are safe to import).
acceptanceCriteria: `npm run build` (or the projectâ€™s standard frontend build command) completes without TypeScript or bundler errors.

The following placeholder files are no longer empty and each exports a valid React component (or they are removed from all imports/routes if intentionally unused): `frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/Products.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/CareerSection.tsx`.
The app loads in the browser without a blank screen or runtime import errors.

file_operations.description: Implement a minimal, type-safe `Hero` React component export (and optional default export) so any existing imports compile successfully.
Implement a minimal, type-safe `Products` React component export (and optional default export) so any existing imports compile successfully.
Implement a minimal, type-safe `ContactSection` React component export (and optional default export) so any existing imports compile successfully.
Implement a minimal, type-safe `CareerSection` React component export (and optional default export) so any existing imports compile successfully.

requirements.summary: Document how to reproduce frontend build failures locally and what to check for common TS/module issues.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md` (or an appropriate existing dev/deploy doc in the frontend folder) includes a short section explaining how to run the local build and what to check when the build fails due to TypeScript/module errors.
All added documentation text is in English.

file_operations.description: Add a concise developer-facing troubleshooting subsection listing the exact local commands to reproduce the build (e.g., install + build) and a checklist focused on empty TS/TSX modules, missing exports, wrong import paths/casing, and other common TypeScript/module-resolution causes of build failures.
